short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances Github diff pages. Click on a line number to open or Option/Ctrl + click on a line number to edit the file at the position.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension asks for access to all websites. This is necessary to support git enterprise installations. Look at the source: https://github.com/larsxschneider/chrome-github-magic
